LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_ArmorRackSetOwnerDe: Set the owner of this armor rack
LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_WearRack_JobFailMes: {0} cannot equip from armor rack (rack is empty)
LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_EquipSetForcedModSe: Equip command sets apparel as forced
LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_TransferSetForcedMo: Transfer command sets apparel as forced
LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_AutoStorageCommand_: When enabled, next transfer command will overwrite the rack's storage settings to match the items worn by the pawn.
LanguageData.ArmorRacksSimplified_EquipSpeedFactor_To: Modifies speed with which pawns equip/transfer items to racks. 100 = normal speed, 0 = instant.
